<a:actiontracker id="dgAt2" onafterchange="alert('The undo length is now ' + this.undolength)" />
<a:datagrid id = "ss3" width = "300" height = "100" actiontracker = "dgAt2"> <a:each match="[element]"> <a:column caption = "Caption 1" value = "[@caption1]" width = "50%" /> <a:column caption = "Caption 2" value = "[@caption2]" width = "50%" /> </a:each> <a:model> <data> <element caption1="Text 1" caption2="Text2"></element> <element caption1="Text 21" caption2="Text22"></element> </data> </a:model> </a:datagrid> <a:table columns="80, 80, 80" cellheight="24" margin="10 0 0 0"> <a:button disabled="{!ss3.sellength}" onclick="ss3.remove()">Remove</a:button> <a:button disabled = "{!dgAt2.undolength}" action = "undo" target = "ss3">Undo</a:button> <a:button disabled = "{!dgAt2.redolength}" action = "redo" target = "ss3">Redo</a:button> </a:table>
